title: About Me | iCyan Studio

profile.name: Toyofumi
profile.title: Software Engineer
profile.bio: A passionate technologist with extensive software engineering experience, specializing in full-stack development and cloud solutions. Focused on creating efficient, scalable applications while maintaining high security standards. Experienced in leading technical projects and implementing innovative solutions across various domains.
